MyProjectView.data:
<%ISiteURL%>/DataAccess/My Project KPIs/Data.aspx;
		>>><%ISiteURL%>/DataCache/Tasks.xml;
		>>><%ISiteURL%>/DataCache/ExpenseTrackingCategories.xml;
		>>><%ISiteURL%>/DataCache/ExpenseTracking.xml;
		>>>[PPM v3.1 ACS]/Toolset/DateRanges/DateRanges.aspx;
		>>><%ISiteURL%>/DataCache/OverdueTasks.xml;
		<%ISiteURL%>/DataAccess/Risks/Data.aspx?Query=<Where><Contains><FieldRef Name='AssignedTo' /><Value Type='User'>[Me]</Value></Contains></Where>;
		<%ISiteURL%>/DataAccess/Deliverables/Data.aspx?Query=<Where><Contains><FieldRef Name='Assigned%5Fx0020%5FTo0' /><Value Type='User'>[Me]</Value></Contains></Where>;
